entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
